message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $20000. Is this something you'd like to take a closer look at?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that $18000 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $19000. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $19000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $17500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
